meanings.sent1: The wealthy family owned a beautiful quinta in the countryside.
meanings.sent2: We visited a charming quinta with a large garden and a swimming pool.
meanings.sent3: The quinta had so many rooms that even the ghosts got lost!
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like a quinta, welcoming and expansive.
meanings.sent5: The quinta stood proudly on the hill, overlooking the valley.

meanings.definition: A musical interval of a fifth
meanings.sent1: The musicians harmonized perfectly, creating a lovely quinta in their melody.
meanings.sent2: The song ended with a beautiful quinta that left the audience in awe.
meanings.sent3: The quinta in the music made everyone want to dance like never before.
meanings.sent4: His voice soared like a quinta, reaching heights no one thought possible.
meanings.sent5: The quinta in the song added a magical touch that enchanted the listeners.

meanings.definition: A unit of currency in several Latin American countries
meanings.sent1: She exchanged her dollars for the local quinta to buy souvenirs.
meanings.sent2: The market displayed prices in both dollars and quinta for tourists.
meanings.sent3: He found a forgotten quinta in his pocket and used it to buy a snack.
meanings.sent4: The quinta jingled in his pocket, a reminder of his travels.
meanings.sent5: The colorful quinta added a touch of exoticism to the shopping experience.
